_meta.source: Researched from Sitka tourism, NPS, and Alaska cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers downtown Sitka and surrounding attractions

transit_routes.name: Tender to Sitka
transit_routes.note: Tender port - ships anchor in Sitka Sound. Tenders run continuously to O'Connell or Crescent Harbor.

transit_routes.name: Walk Downtown
transit_routes.note: Downtown and NHP very walkable from both tender locations.

featured_experiences.name: Sitka National Historical Park
featured_experiences.note: Site of last major Tlingit resistance to Russians. Beautiful rainforest walk with totems.

featured_experiences.name: Alaska Raptor Center
featured_experiences.note: Up-close with eagles and other raptors. Very popular - book ship excursion or taxi.

featured_experiences.name: Russian Heritage Walking
featured_experiences.note: Alaska's Russian capital before 1867 purchase. Cathedral icons from 1848.
